content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

1. What is the Current Market Regime?
NEUTRAL regime — normal volatility with very narrow participation. Vol: 26.0%. Breadth: 1/8 sectors positive.

2. Which sectors are leading?
Banking & Finance is the lone leader with pocket strength; selective large caps lead the move. AKBNK (1W: +2.98% | 1M: +14.94%) ABOVE TREND, VAKBN (1W: +2.93% | 1M: +21.74%) ABOVE TREND, YKBNK (1W: +3.21% | 1M: +12.56%) ABOVE TREND.

3. Which sectors are lagging?
Transportation and Technology are the weakest on sharp 1W losses and falling participation. THYAO (1W: -10.58% | 1M: +3.09%) CORRECTION, TAVHL (1W: -11.42% | 1M: -3.76%) BELOW TREND, KONTR (1W: -11.01% | 1M: +2.82%) CORRECTION.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

4. Top Performing Stocks?
TRALT (1W: +13.07% | 1M: +13.17%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +12.32% | 1M: +14.86%) ABOVE TREND, EREGL (1W: +9.90% | 1M: +15.87%) ABOVE TREND, ASELS (1W: +5.10% | 1M: -4.41%) RECOVERY, YKBNK (1W: +3.21% | 1M: +12.56%) ABOVE TREND.

5. Worst Performing Stocks?
ARCLK (1W: -8.26% | 1M: +5.68%) CORRECTION, HEKTS (1W: -8.65% | 1M: -1.25%) BELOW TREND, TKFEN (1W: -8.84% | 1M: +10.59%) CORRECTION, TSKB (1W: -8.94% | 1M: -2.56%) BELOW TREND, SASA (1W: -9.09% | 1M: -4.00%) BELOW TREND.

6. Momentum Stocks?
Biggest 1W movers: TRALT (1W: +13.07% | 1M: +13.17%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +12.32% | 1M: +14.86%) ABOVE TREND, TAVHL (1W: -11.42% | 1M: -3.76%) BELOW TREND, KONTR (1W: -11.01% | 1M: +2.82%) CORRECTION, THYAO (1W: -10.58% | 1M: +3.09%) CORRECTION.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

7. Banking Sector Outlook?
Banks show the only broad positive sector return but participation is uneven; focus on large-cap balance-sheet plays. AKBNK (1W: +2.98% | 1M: +14.94%) ABOVE TREND, GARAN (1W: +0.13% | 1M: +5.77%) ABOVE TREND, ISCTR (1W: -1.94% | 1M: +12.43%) CORRECTION, TSKB (1W: -8.94% | 1M: -2.56%) BELOW TREND.

8. Industrial Sector Outlook?
Heavy industry is bifurcated — exporters and select steel names outperform while auto and domestic cyclicals fade short term. EREGL (1W: +9.90% | 1M: +15.87%) ABOVE TREND, KRDMD (1W: +2.33% | 1M: +9.86%) ABOVE TREND, VESTL (1W: -9.79% | 1M: -3.55%) BELOW TREND, FROTO (1W: -6.42% | 1M: +10.95%) CORRECTION.

9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?
Energy names show dispersion — a couple of strong metals/chemicals rallied while specialty chemicals and refiners lag. TRALT (1W: +13.07% | 1M: +13.17%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +12.32% | 1M: +14.86%) ABOVE TREND, TUPRS (1W: +0.91% | 1M: -2.20%) RECOVERY, SASA (1W: -9.09% | 1M: -4.00%) BELOW TREND.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

10. Portfolio Recommendation?
Neutral tactical stance: overweight high-quality banks and select industrial exporters, underweight transportation and weak tech names; keep cash buffer for continued narrow breadth. Trim positions showing 1W weakness despite 1M strength.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?
EREGL (1W: +9.90% | 1M: +15.87%) ABOVE TREND, TRALT (1W: +13.07% | 1M: +13.17%) ABOVE TREND, AKBNK (1W: +2.98% | 1M: +14.94%) ABOVE TREND, THYAO (1W: -10.58% | 1M: +3.09%) CORRECTION.

12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?
Banking & Finance for leadership confirmation, Transportation for downside risk and flow reversal, Energy & Chemicals for dispersion and earnings/catalyst-driven moves.

13. Key Levels & Triggers?
Watch XU100 near key technical band — support ~2,350 and resistance ~2,600; sustained close above resistance would signal leadership expansion, break below support would deepen the rotation. Macro and earnings beats/misses, FX moves, and regional geopolitics remain primary triggers.

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
NEUTRAL regime: normal volatility (26.0%) but extremely narrow participation (1/8 sectors positive). Trade selectively — favor large-cap banks and export-oriented industrials, underweight transportation and weak momentum tech/chemical names; monitor breadth and XU100 support/resistance for conviction changes.
